content: 你好，请问有什么可以帮您

帮我画一只浣熊在洗澡

{i_g: A raccoon taking a bath, sitting in a small wooden tub filled with water. The raccoon is using its paws to scrub its fur, with water splashing around. The background is a cozy bathroom with tiles on the walls and a window letting in soft sunlight. The lighting is warm and the atmosphere is relaxed.}\n希望你会喜欢这幅画！
